titleStmt.title: SII 13.146: original edition by G.V. Srinivasa Rao
No. 146. (A.R. No. 585 of 1920.) UḌAYĀRGUḌI (NEAR KĀṬṬUMANNĀRKŌYIL), CHIDAMBARAM TALUK, SOUTH ARCOT DISTRICT. ON THE NORTH, WEST AND SOUTH WALLS OF THE CENTRAL SHRINE, ANANTĪŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This records an endowment, tax-free, of ten plots of land after purchasing them from their several owners by Śēkkiḻāṉ Araiyaṉ Śaṅkaranārāyaṇaṉ alias Śōḻamuttaraiyaṉ of Mērpaḻuvūr in Maṇaiyiṟ-kōṭṭam of Toṇḍai-nāḍu, who left them for charitable purposes in charge of the assembly of Vīranārāyaṇa-chaturvēdimaṅgalam, called the Śāsanabaddha-chaturvēdibhaṭṭa-perumbaḍi-sahasradāna-perumakkaḷ.

svasti śrī . korājakesarivarmmaṟku yāṇṭu 6Āvatu vaṭakarai piramateyam śrīviranārāyaṇa ccaturvvedimaṅkalattu śāsanabaddhaccaturvvedibhaṭṭa perumpaṭi sahasradāna perumakkaḷukku toṇṭaināṭṭu maṇaiyiṟkoṭṭattu meṟpaḻuvūrc cekkiḻāṉaraiyaṉ caṅkaranārāyaṇanākiya coḻamuttaraiyaneṉ dharmmattukku can=tirātittavat niṟka kuṭutta nilamāvatu Ivvūr vaṭapiṭākai viṣuvatikku kiḻakku viranārāyaṇavāykkālukku vaṭakku 1 kaṇṇāṟṟu mutal caturattu kaṭavuṭ śrīdharakramavittaṉuḷḷiṭṭa Aṭṭakattu paṭṭa 4�viṉ
vaṭakkaṭaiya koṟureṭṭi kaṇampikramavittaṉ pakkal vilaikoṇṭuṭaiya nilaṉ 3�m Ivaṉ pakkale Ikkaṇṇāṟṟu muṉṟāñ caturattu māṉaviramaturai paṭṭaccomācipaṭṭaruḷḷiṭṭa Aṭṭakattukku paṭṭa 4�viṉ teṉmeṟkaṭaiy vilaikoṇṭuṭaiya Araikkāṇiyum Ivvatikke kiḻakku Ivvāykkālukku vaṭakku 2Āṅkaṇṇāṟṟu 3Āñcaturattu kumāṇṭūr comāci perumāṉpaṭṭaṉuḷḷiṭṭa Aṭṭakattukkupaṭṭa nālmāvil nellūr tāmotirapaṭṭa mpimārum pakkal vilaikoṇṭuṭaiya Orumā ceyyum can=tiracekaravatikku kiḻakkum Ivvāyk kālukku vaṭakku 10Āṅkaṇṇāṟṟu
Iraṇṭāñcaturattup pūcāpovaṉ tivākarakramavittaṉuḷḷiṭṭa Aṭṭakattukkuppaṭṭa 4�vil vaṅkippuṟattu tiruviṉāṉkramavittaṉpakkal vilaikoṇṭuṭaiya Araimācceyum viranārāyaṇavatikku kiḻakku māṉavallavāykkālukku vaṭakku 4Āṅkaṇṇāṟṟu muṉṟāñ caturattu Ātaṉur tāyaṉ nārāyaṇaccomāciyāṉuḷḷiṭṭa Aṭṭakattu(r)kkuppaṭṭa kiḻai Aṟumāvil Iṭaiyāṟṟukkuṭi kumaraṉ puvattaṉum kumaraṉ can=tiracekaraṉum pakkal vilai koṇṭuṭaiya teṟkaṭainta Orumāvaraic ceyyum kiḻpiṭākai kotaṇṭarāmavatikku meṟkku kaṇavativāykkālukku teṟkku Āṟāṅkaṇṇāṟṟu nālāñcaturattu velveṭṭi mādhavasvāmi daśapuriyaṉuḷḷiṭṭa Aṭṭakattukkupaṭṭa Aṟumāvil vasthamaṇi caṅkaranārāyaṇapaṭṭac comāciyārpakkalum koma
ṭattu govarddhanapaṭṭan brāhmaṇipakkalum vilaikoṇṭuṭaiya kiḻakkaṭaiya Orumāvaraic ceyyum śrīdharavatikku kiḻakku kaṇavativāykkālukku teṟkku 7Āṅkaṇṇāṟṟu 4Āñ caturattu Iruṅkaṇṭi kumāraṭikramavittaṉuḷḷiṭṭa Aṭṭakattukkuppaṭṭa 3�viṉ meṟkkaṭaiya kokkaṇat tiruvācakatevaṉpakkal vilaikoṇṭuṭaiya nila mākāṇi Araikkāṇiyum nattakkuḻi yiraṇṭum can=tiracekaravatikku kiḻakkum parān=takavāykkālukku vaṭakku Eṭṭāṅkaṇṇāṟṟu Añcāntuṇṭattuk kuñcappavil maṅkalanampiccaturvvetipaṭṭaṉuḷḷiṭṭa Aṭṭakattukkuppaṭṭa Araikkāle yaraikkāṇiyil teṟkaṭaiya tirupper tāmotiraṉ jātavedasahasran pirāmaṇipakkal vilaikoṇṭuṭaiya mākāṇi mun=tirikaiyaraimun=tirikaiyu mitaṉ kiḻakku Ivaṉ pakkale vilaikoṇṭuṭaiya
(itaṉ kuṟai Ikkallile pāttu vācikka) nilam Araikkāṇi Arai mun=tirikaiyumāka Oru māvaraic ceyyumāka Ippattu ceyyum cantrādittavat niṟkak kuṭuttu Itu Eppeṟpaṭṭa Iṟaiyumiṟu
